price: Kuri uwo munsi, nta muntu cyangwa ijini uzagira icyo abazwa ku bijyanye n’ibyaha bye (kuko bizaba bizwi neza)
arabic: فَيَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّا يُسۡـَٔلُ عَن ذَنۢبِهِۦٓ إِنسٞ وَلَا جَآنّٞ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: fayawma-idhin lā yus'alu ʿan dhanbihi insun walā jānnun
